message.body: How are things with Agatha since we shared a meal? We didn't scare her off, did we?
Haha no she was here this weekend. Left today. Only 8 more weeks here though
Makes me kind of sad. How are you two taking it?

Eh she doesn't like to talk about it. I dunno I kind of knew what I was getting into. I seem to get myself into these sorts of predicaments often. I'm trying to just enjoy it for what its worth I guess
Its Agata though btw. I'm assuming your phone is auto correcting though
No. I just assumed the th was pronounced t like in German or Indian. But it's just t like it sounds. I don't see any mention of Agata on your Facebook page.
A picture would be nice I guess. Do we have one from spago?
Yeah we only have a few pics together. I'm very selective about what pictures I put online
